verses.verse: <S%G1353><s%> And Having Journeyed Through <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Amphipolis <S%G295><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Apollonia <S%G624><s%> They Came <S%G2064><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Thessalonica, <S%G2332><s%> Where <S%G3699><s%> Was <S%G2258><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Synagogue <S%G4864><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Jews. <S%G2453><s%>

<S%G2596><s%> And According To <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Custom <S%G1486><s%> With <S%G3588><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> He Went In <S%G1525><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> For <S%G1909><s%> Sabbaths <S%G4521><s%> Three <S%G5140><s%> Reasoned <S%G1256><s%> With Them <S%G846><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Scriptures, <S%G1124><s%>

Opening <S%G1272><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Setting Forth <S%G3908><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> It Behoved <S%G1163><s%> To Have Suffered <S%G3958><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Have Risen <S%G450><s%> From Among The <S%G1537><s%> Dead, <S%G3498><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> I 1473 P-1NS Announce 2605 V-PAI-1S To You. 5213 P-2DP

And <S%G2532><s%> Some <S%G5100><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Were Obedient, <S%G3982><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Joined Themselves <S%G4345><s%> To <S%G3588><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To <S%G3588><s%> Silas, <S%G4609><s%> And <S%G3588><s%> Of The <S%G5037><s%> Worshipping <S%G4576><s%> Greeks <S%G1672><s%> A Great <S%G4183><s%> Multitude, <S%G4128><s%> <S%G1135><s%> And Of Women <S%G5037><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Chief <S%G4413><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> A Few. <S%G3641><s%>

<S%G2206><s%> But Having Become Envious <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Disobeying <S%G544><s%> Jews, <S%G2453><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Taken To Them <S%G4355><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Market Loungers <S%G60><s%> Certain <S%G5100><s%> Men <S%G435><s%> Evil, <S%G4190><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Collected A Crowd <S%G3792><s%> Raised In Tumult <S%G2350><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> City; <S%G4172><s%> <S%G2186><s%> And Having Assaulted <S%G5037><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> House <S%G3614><s%> Of Jason <S%G2394><s%> They Sought <S%G2212><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> To Bring Out <S%G71><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> People; <S%G1218><s%>

But <S%G3361><s%> <S%G2147><s%> Not Having Found <S%G1161><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> They Dragged <S%G4951><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jason <S%G2394><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Certain <S%G5100><s%> Brethren <S%G80><s%> Before <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> City Magistrates, <S%G4173><s%> <S%G994><s%> Crying Out, <S%G3754><s%> Those Who <S%G3588><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Habitable World <S%G3625><s%> Have Set In Confusion <S%G387><s%> These <S%G3778><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Here <S%G1759><s%> Are Come, <S%G3918><s%>

Whom <S%G3739><s%> Has Received <S%G5264><s%> Jason; <S%G2394><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> These <S%G3778><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Contrary <S%G561><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Decrees <S%G1378><s%> Of Caesar <S%G2541><s%> Do, <S%G4238><s%> King <S%G935><s%> Saying <S%G3004><s%> Another <S%G2087><s%> There Is <S%G1511><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>
<S%G5015><s%> And They Troubled <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crowd <S%G3793><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> City Magistrates <S%G4173><s%> Hearing <S%G191><s%> These Things. <S%G5023><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Taken <S%G2983><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Security <S%G2425><s%> From <S%G3844><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jason <S%G2394><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Rest <S%G3062><s%> They Let Go <S%G630><s%> Them. <S%G846><s%>

But <S%G3588><s%> The <S%G1161><s%> Brethren <S%G80><s%> Immediately <S%G2112><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Night <S%G3571><s%> <S%G1599><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Sent Away <S%G5037><s%> Both Paul <S%G3972><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Silas <S%G4609><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Baara; <S%G960><s%> Who, <S%G3748><s%> Being Arrived, <S%G3854><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Synagogue <S%G4864><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Jews <S%G2453><s%> Went. <S%G549><s%>

<S%G3778><s%> And These <S%G1161><s%> Were <S%G2258><s%> More Noble <S%G2104><s%> Than Those <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Thessalonica, <S%G2332><s%> Who <S%G3748><s%> Received <S%G1209><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Readiness, <S%G4288><s%> <S%G3588><s%> ' <S%G2596><s%> Daily <S%G2250><s%> Examining <S%G350><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Scriptures <S%G1124><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Were <S%G2192><s%> These Things <S%G5023><s%> So. <S%G3779><s%>

Many <S%G4183><s%> Indeed <S%G3303><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> From Among <S%G1537><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Believed, <S%G4100><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Grecian <S%G1674><s%> Women <S%G1135><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Honourable <S%G2158><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Men <S%G435><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> A Few. <S%G3641><s%>

But <S%G5613><s%> When <S%G1161><s%> Knew <S%G1097><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> From <S%G575><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Thessalonica <S%G2332><s%> Jews <S%G2453><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Baara <S%G960><s%> Was Announced <S%G2605><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%> They Came <S%G2064><s%> Also There <S%G2546><s%> Stirring Up <S%G4531><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crowds. <S%G3793><s%>

<S%G2112><s%> And Immediately <S%G1161><s%> Then <S%G5119><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> Sent Away <S%G1821><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Brethren <S%G80><s%> To Go <S%G4198><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> To <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sea; <S%G2281><s%> <S%G5278><s%> But Remained <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Both <S%G5037><s%> Silas <S%G4609><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Timothy <S%G5095><s%> There. <S%G1563><s%>

But <S%G3588><s%> Those <S%G1161><s%> Conducting <S%G2525><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> Brought <S%G71><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Unto <S%G2193><s%> Athens; <S%G116><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Received <S%G2983><s%> A Command <S%G1785><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Silas <S%G4609><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Timothy, <S%G5095><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Quickly As Possible <S%G5033><s%> They Should <S%G2064><s%> Come To <S%G4314><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> They Departed. <S%G1826><s%>

But <S%G1722><s%> In <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Athens <S%G116><s%> Waiting For <S%G1551><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Paul, <S%G3972><s%> Was Painfully Excited <S%G3947><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> His <S%G846><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Seeing <S%G2334><s%> Full Of Idols <S%G2712><s%> Being <S%G5607><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> City. <S%G4172><s%>

He Reasoned <S%G1256><s%> Indeed <S%G3303><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Synagogue <S%G4864><s%> With The <S%G3588><s%> Jews <S%G2453><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Worshipped, <S%G4576><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> <S%G58><s%> Market Place <S%G2596><s%> Every Day <S%G3956><s%> With <S%G2250><s%> Those Who <S%G4314><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Met With Him. <S%G3909><s%>

But <S%G5100><s%> Some <S%G1161><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Epicureans <S%G1946><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Stoics, <S%G4770><s%> Philosophers, <S%G5386><s%> Encountered <S%G4820><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Some <S%G5100><s%> Said, <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5101><s%> What <S%G302><s%> May Desire <S%G2309><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4691><s%> This Chatterer <S%G3778><s%> To Say? <S%G3004><s%> And <S%G3588><s%> Some, <S%G1161><s%> Of Foreign <S%G3581><s%> Gods (lit. Demons) <S%G1140><s%> He Seems <S%G1380><s%> A Proclaimer <S%G2604><s%> To Be, <S%G1511><s%> Because Of <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Resurrection <S%G386><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> He Announced The Glad Tidings. <S%G2097><s%>

<S%G1949><s%> And Having Taken Hold <S%G5037><s%> Of Him, <S%G846><s%> To <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Mars ' <S%G697><s%> Hill <S%G697><s%> They Brought Him, <S%G71><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Are We Able <S%G1410><s%> To Know <S%G1097><s%> What Is <S%G5101><s%> <S%G3588><s%> New <S%G2537><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> Which <S%G3588><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> Thee <S%G4675><s%> Is Spoken <S%G2980><s%> Teaching? <S%G1322><s%>

Strange Things <S%G3579><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> Certain <S%G5100><s%> Thou Bringest <S%G1533><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Our <S%G189><s%> Ears. <S%G2257><s%> We Wish <S%G1014><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> To Know <S%G1097><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> May <S%G302><s%> Mean <S%G2309><s%> <S%G5023><s%> These Things. <S%G1511><s%>

Athenians <S%G117><s%> Now <S%G1161><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sojourning <S%G1927><s%> Strangers <S%G3581><s%> In <S%G1519><s%> Nothing <S%G3762><s%> Else <S%G2087><s%>, Spent Their Leisure <S%G2119><s%> Than <S%G2228><s%> To Tell <S%G3004><s%> Something <S%G5100><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Hear <S%G191><s%> Newer. <S%G2537><s%>

<S%G2476><s%> And Having Stood <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Midst <S%G3319><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Mars ' <S%G697><s%> Hill <S%G697><s%> Said, <S%G5346><s%> Men <S%G435><s%> Athenians, <S%G117><s%> In <S%G2596><s%> <S%G3956><s%> All Things <S%G5613><s%> Very Religious (lit. Very Reverent To Demons) <S%G1174><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> I Behold; <S%G2334><s%>

Passing Through <S%G1330><s%> For, <S%G1063><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Beholding <S%G333><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Objects Of Veneration <S%G4574><s%> Your, <S%G5216><s%> I Found <S%G2147><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> An Altar <S%G1041><s%> On <S%G1722><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Had Been Inscribed, <S%G1924><s%> To An Unknown <S%G57><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Not Knowing <S%G50><s%> Ye Reverence, <S%G2151><s%> Him <S%G5126><s%> I 1473 P-1NS Announce 2605 V-PAI-1S To You. 5213 P-2DP

The <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Made <S%G4160><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> World <S%G2889><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> All Things <S%G3956><s%> That Are <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> It, <S%G846><s%> He <S%G3778><s%> Of Heaven <S%G3772><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Earth <S%G1093><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Being, <S%G5225><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Handmade <S%G5499><s%> Temples <S%G3485><s%> Dwells, <S%G2730><s%>

Nor <S%G3761><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> Hands <S%G5495><s%> Of Men <S%G444><s%> Is Served <S%G2323><s%> As Needing <S%G4326><s%> Anything, <S%G5100><s%> Himself <S%G846><s%> Giving <S%G1325><s%> To All <S%G3956><s%> Life <S%G2222><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Breath <S%G4157><s%> In Every <S%G2596><s%> Respect ; <S%G3956><s%>

<S%G4160><s%> And He Made <S%G5037><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> Blood <S%G129><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Nation <S%G1484><s%> Of Men, <S%G444><s%> To Dwell <S%G2730><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Face <S%G4383><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Earth, <S%G1093><s%> Having Determined <S%G3724><s%> Forearranged <S%G4384><s%> Times <S%G2540><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Boundaries <S%G3734><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Dwelling <S%G2733><s%> Their <S%G846><s%>

To Seek <S%G2212><s%> The <S%G3588><s%>, Lord; <S%G2962><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Perhaps <S%G686><s%> <S%G1065><s%> They Might Feel After <S%G5584><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Might Find Him, <S%G2147><s%> Though Indeed <S%G2544><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Far <S%G3112><s%> From <S%G575><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> Each <S%G1538><s%> Of Us <S%G2257><s%> Being; <S%G5225><s%>

In <S%G1722><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> We Live <S%G2198><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Move <S%G2795><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Are; <S%G2070><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Some <S%G5100><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> ' Among <S%G2596><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> Poets <S%G4163><s%> Have Said, <S%G2046><s%> Of Him <S%G3588><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Offspring <S%G1085><s%> We Are. <S%G2070><s%>

Offspring <S%G1085><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Being <S%G5225><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> We <S%G3756><s%> Ought Not <S%G3784><s%> To Think <S%G3543><s%> Of Gold <S%G5557><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> To Silver <S%G696><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> To Stone, <S%G3037><s%> A Graven Thing <S%G5480><s%> Of Art <S%G5078><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Imagination <S%G1761><s%> Of Man, <S%G444><s%> That Which Is <S%G3588><s%> Divine <S%G2304><s%> To Be <S%G1511><s%> Like. <S%G3664><s%>

The <S%G3588><s%> Indeed <S%G3303><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Times <S%G5550><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Ignorance <S%G52><s%> Having Overlooked <S%G5237><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Now <S%G3568><s%> Charges <S%G3853><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Men <S%G444><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Everywhere <S%G3837><s%> To Repent, <S%G3340><s%>

Because <S%G1360><s%> He Set <S%G2476><s%> A Day <S%G2250><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> He Is About <S%G3195><s%> To Judge <S%G2919><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Habitable World <S%G3625><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Righteousness, <S%G1343><s%> By <S%G1722><s%> A Man <S%G435><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> He Appointed; <S%G3724><s%> Proof <S%G4102><s%> Having Given <S%G3930><s%> To All In <S%G3956><s%> Having Raised <S%G450><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> From Among The <S%G1537><s%> Dead. <S%G3498><s%>

<S%G191><s%> And Having Heard <S%G1161><s%> A Resurrection <S%G386><s%> Of The Dead, <S%G3498><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Some <S%G3303><s%> Mocked, <S%G5512><s%> And <S%G3588><s%> Some <S%G1161><s%>, Said, <S%G2036><s%> We Will Hear <S%G191><s%> Thee <S%G4675><s%> Again <S%G3825><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> This. <S%G5127><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> Thus <S%G3779><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> Went Out <S%G1831><s%> From The <S%G1537><s%> Midst <S%G3319><s%> Of Them. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G5100><s%> But Some <S%G1161><s%> Men <S%G435><s%> Joining Themselves <S%G2853><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> Believed; <S%G4100><s%> Among <S%G1722><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> Also Was <S%G2532><s%> Dionysius <S%G1354><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Areopagite, <S%G698><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> A Woman <S%G1135><s%> By Name <S%G3686><s%> Damaris <S%G1152><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Others <S%G2087><s%> With <S%G4862><s%> Them. <S%G846><s%>
